q.description: Search string - counterparty name or asset or ticketId. Optional

statuses.description: Ticket statuses for Smart Transfer tickets. Optional

networkId.description: NetworkId that is used in the ticket	. Optional

createdByMe.description: Filter created tickets by created by self or by others. Optional

expiresAfter.description: Lower bound of search range. Optional

expiresBefore.description: Upper bound of search range. Optional

type.description: Type of transfer. ASYNC executes transfers as they are funded, ATOMIC executes all terms (legs) as one atomic transfer

externalRefId.description: External ref. ID that workspace can use to identify ticket outside of Fireblocks system.

after.description: ID of the record after which to fetch $limit records

limit.description: Number of records to fetch. By default, it is 100
